alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, or 22 miles west of Pembroke Pines, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley and West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County
